title: Crocodile Dundee (Captioned)
creator_credit: Paramount Pictures, Hoyts, Rimfire Films, John Cornell and Peter Fairman
brief_description: A New York reporter is intrigued by stories of an Australian crocodile hunter (Paul Hogan) and accompanies him on a journey through the bush. She entices him back to Manhattan, where his very outback Australian approach to the dangers of a big city, make him a success in New York society.
creator_credit_for_label: Paramount Pictures, Hoyts, Rimfire Films, John Cornell and Peter Fairman
